original_text: who had not consented to their decision and action; and he was looking for the kingdom of God.
korean_text: (그들의 결의와 행사에 찬성하지 아니한 자라) 그는 유대인의 동네 아리마대 사람이요 하나님의 나라를 기다리는 자라

sentences.original_text: who had not consented to their decision and action
and he was looking for the kingdom of God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 하나님의 나라를 찾고 있었다
